description: Launching our new website! Please stay tuned for more updates from our group! We will migrate information from the old website , including members, research projects, and publication, etc.
Had so much fun in our 3-day group retreat to White Mountain in New Hampshire!
Our PhD student Zhichao Yang (UMass Amherst) succesfully defended his PhD thesis. Congratulation, Dr. Yang!
Our group is recruiting multiple UMass Amherst MS students for 696 Independent Study. Please check the link [CLOSED -- please check during January 2025 for the spring recruitment.].
Welcome our new PhD student in UMass Amherst, Mingchen Li!
Welcome our new student researchers, Jiatan Huang (Lowell) and Siva H (Amherst)!
Welcome back Minhwa Lee for joining our group as a research staff!
Our LLaMACare and LocalTweets are accepted to LREC-COLING 2024!
